mapper.select: select storage_table.date, sum(storage_table.used) over (partition by storage_table.storage_name order by date) as daily_sum, storage_table.storage_name as storage_name, storage_list.total from storage_table, storage_list group by storage_table.date order by date asc
mapper.insert: insert into storage_per_date(date, daily_sum, storage_name, total) values (#{date},#{daily_sum},#{storage_name},#{total})
